encoding_info.description: Data type mapping for decoding - IPv6 version
encoding_info.float_encoding: Each float becomes 2 RGB pixels (6 bytes total)
encoding_info.mac_encoding: MAC address split into 2 hex chunks
encoding_info.ipv4_encoding: IPv4 address split into 4 octets, each becomes 2 RGB pixels
encoding_info.ipv6_encoding: IPv6 address becomes 6 RGB pixels (16 bytes + 2 padding)
encoding_info.integer_note: All integers converted to floats before encoding
encoding_info.string_encoding: Hashed to integer, converted to float, then 2 RGB pixels
